EmailTemplate.name: JFS Provisional Period Exceeded
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Program__c.Name},{!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}Provisional License Period Exceeded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The provisional period for {!CLQ_Program__c.Name}, {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} has passed and a recommendation for a continuous license has not been approved.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
